title: Food Bank Sunday
description: Please bring non-perishable food items to donate to the local food bank. Items can be placed in the donation box in the foyer.

title: Grief Share
description: Meeting Saturdays at Florence-Carlton church. Group discussion will follow each free session. Each session includes a short video featuring interviews with grief recovery experts and real-life stories of people who have experienced the death of a loved one. Contact the church office for more information.

title: Bitterroot Valley Living Center
description: Join us for a time of worship and fellowship at the Bitterroot Valley Living Center. We will be leading a worship service for the residents and employees. For more information, contact the church office.

title: Christmas Boxes
description: Christmas boxes for Samaritan's Purse Operation Christmas Child are due November 17th. Please bring your filled boxes to the church by this date.

title: Men's Basketball
description: Men's Basketball will be starting November 18th at 6:30pm in the new gym!

title: Ladies Thanksgiving Celebration
description: The Ladies afternoon Bible Study invites the ladies of the church to join them for a time of giving thanks and praises. Yummy goodies will be served, songs will be sung, and Bonnie Goold will give a word of thanksgiving.

title: Baby Shower for Dani Kramer (Reissing)
description: There will be a Baby Shower for Dani Kramer (Reissing) on November 30th at 1:00pm. Please mark your calendar and join in this happy event. More info to come.

title: Christmas Ornament Painting
description: Rachael Thomas invites all Ladies to come decorate Christmas ornaments on December 12th at 12:30pm in the fellowship hall. A lunch of taco soup and bread will be served. Ornaments start at $5.00, with paint and brushes provided.

title: Ladies Christmas Brunch
description: The annual Ladies Christmas Brunch will be held on December 14th from 10:00am to 1:00pm at the Hofmans. More details to come.
